insert into html_goods_grmp
uuid,
name,
mobile,

qq,
weibo,

job,
touxian,
address,
note,
avatorUrl,

qrcode,

#{name},
#{mobile},
#{email},
#{url},
#{fax},
#{phone},
#{weixin},
#{qq},
#{weibo},
#{company},
#{dep},
#{job},
#{touxian},
#{address},
#{note},
#{avatorUrl},
now(),
#{qrcode},

insert into account_pay_record
outTradeNo,
accountNumber,
payTime,
endTime,
vipType,
payType,
money,
phone,
values
#{outTradeNo},
#{accountNumber},
#{payTime},
#{endTime},
#{vipType},
#{payType},
#{money},
#{phone}

insert into create_pay_code_record
outTradeNo,
accountNumber,
phone,
vipType,
payType,
money,
codeUrl
values
#{outTradeNo},
#{accountNumber},
#{phone},
#{vipType},
#{payType},
#{money},
#{codeUrl}

insert into jfdhjp_customer
openId,
nickName,
createTime, takeCount, takeScoreSum, score
values
#{openId},
#{nickName},
now(), 0, 0, 0

insert into prize_code
codeNo,
createTime,
accountNumber,
sqUuid,
state
values
#{codeNo},
now(),
#{accountNumber},
#{sqUuid},
0

insert into jfdhjp_activity
dhjpScore,
jpmLimit,
jpmdhReg,
endTime,
accountNumber,
enable,
values
#{dhjpScore},
#{jpmLimit},
#{jpmdhReg},
#{endTime},
#{accountNumber},
#{enable},

insert into goods_label_set
`key`,
label,
module,
isShow,
isPublic,
isCheck,
accountNumber,
sort
values
#{key},
#{label},
#{module},
#{isShow},
#{isPublic},
#{isCheck},
#{accountNumber},
#{sort}
mapper.select: select `key` from goods_label_set where module=#{module} and accountNumber=#{accountNumber} and `KEY` like'key%' ORDER BY `key`
select * from create_pay_code_record where outTradeNo=#{outTradeNo}
select * from account_pay_record where accountNumber=#{accountNumber} order by payTime desc limit 1
select endTime from account_pay_record where accountNumber=#{accountNumber} order by payTime desc limit 1
select * from jfdhjp_customer where openId=#{openId}
mapper.update: update account_info set payMoney=payMoney+#{money},payTime=#{payTime} where id=#{accountNumber}
update score_qrcode set score=#{score} where uuid=#{uuid}
update score_qrcode set enable=1,openId=#{openId} where uuid=#{uuid}
update jfdhjp_customer set score=score+#{score},takeCount=takeCount+1,takeScoreSum=takeScoreSum+#{score} where openId=#{openId}
update jfdhjp_customer set score=score-#{dhjpScore} where openId=#{openId}

update html_goods_grmp set
name=#{name},
email=#{email},
url=#{url},
fax=#{fax},
phone=#{phone},
weixin=#{weixin},
qq=#{qq},
weibo=#{weibo},
company=#{company},
dep=#{dep},
job=#{job},
touxian=#{touxian},
address=#{address},
note=#{note},
avatorUrl=#{avatorUrl},
mobile=#{mobile}
where uuid=#{uuid}

image1_1=#{image1_1}, image1_2=#{image1_2}, image1_3=#{image1_3}, image1_4=#{image1_4}, image1_5=#{image1_5}, image2_1=#{image2_1}, image2_2=#{image2_2}, image2_3=#{image2_3}, image2_4=#{image2_4}, image2_5=#{image2_5}, image3_1=#{image3_1}, image3_2=#{image3_2}, image3_3=#{image3_3}, image3_4=#{image3_4}, image3_5=#{image3_5}, image4_1=#{image4_1}, image4_2=#{image4_2}, image4_3=#{image4_3}, image4_4=#{image4_4}, image4_5=#{image4_5}, embed1_1=#{embed1_1},

update account_info set passWord=#{passWord} where id=#{id}
update account_info set qrcodeCount=qrcodeCount+#{qrcodeCount} where id=#{id}
update prize_code set state=1 where id=#{id}
update prize_code set state=2 where now()>DATE_ADD(createTime,INTERVAL #{jpmLimit} DAY) and accountNumber=#{accountNumber}

update account_info set
avatar_img=#{avatar_img},
companyName=#{companyName},
companyAddress=#{companyAddress},
postcode=#{postcode},
phone=#{phone},
quotient=#{quotient},
fax=#{fax},
email=#{email},
countCode=#{countCode},
recordNumber=#{recordNumber},
nickName=#{nickName},
where id=#{id}

update jfdhjp_activity set
dhjpScore=#{dhjpScore},
jpmLimit=#{jpmLimit},
jpmdhReg=#{jpmdhReg},
endTime=#{endTime},
accountNumber=#{accountNumber},
enable=#{enable}
where id=#{id}
update jfdhjp_activity set jpmdhReg=#{jpmdhReg} where accountNumber=#{accountNumber}
update score_take_record set gkjfqdShow=0 where gkjfqdShow=1 and openId=#{openId} and accountNumber=#{accountNumber}
mapper.select: select * from public_goods where goodsNumber=#{goodsNumber} and accountNumber=#{accountNumber}
select count(*) from public_goods where accountNumber=#{param1} and category_id=#{param2}
select count(*) from score_qrcode where example=1 and jfewmlbShow=1 and accountNumber=#{param1}
select count(*) from html_goods_spzs where accountNumber=#{param1} and moduleType=#{param2}
select count(*) from html_goods_dmtzl where accountNumber=#{param1}
select count(*) from html_goods_dmtts where accountNumber=#{param1}
select count(*) from html_goods_jzsg where accountNumber=#{param1}
select count(*) from html_goods_hdqd where accountNumber=#{param1}
select count(*) from html_goods_smyl where accountNumber=#{param1}
select count(*) from jfdhjp_customer where openId=#{openId}
select count(*) from account_info where openId=#{openId}
select * from account_info where openId=#{openId}
select * from jfdhjp_activity where accountNumber=#{accountNumber}
select * from public_goods where accountNumber=#{param1} and category_id=#{param2} limit ${param3},${param4}
select * from score_qrcode where example=1 and jfewmlbShow=1 and accountNumber=#{param1} order by ${param4} ${param5} limit ${param2},${param3}
select * from html_goods_spzs where accountNumber=#{param1} and moduleType=#{param2} limit ${param3},${param4}
select * from html_goods_dmtzl where accountNumber=#{param1} limit ${param2},${param3}
select * from html_goods_dmtts where accountNumber=#{param1} limit ${param2},${param3}
select * from html_goods_jzsg where accountNumber=#{param1} limit ${param2},${param3}
select * from html_goods_hdqd where accountNumber=#{param1} limit ${param2},${param3}
select * from html_goods_smyl where accountNumber=#{param1} limit ${param2},${param3}
select goodsNumber,title,imgUrl,category_id from public_goods where category_id=#{param1} and accountNumber=#{param2}

select date_format(max(t.createTime),'%m%d') takeDate from score_take_record t LEFT JOIN score_qrcode s on t.sqUuid=s.uuid LEFT JOIN prize_code p on s.uuid=p.sqUuid where s.enable=1 and t.gkjfqdShow=1
and (p.codeNo like CONCAT('%',#{searchTxt},'%') or t.nickName like CONCAT('%',#{searchTxt},'%'))
and s.accountNumber=#{accountNumber} GROUP BY date_format(t.createTime,'%m%d') ORDER BY t.createTime desc

select s.uuid,date_format(max(t.createTime),'%m%d') takeDate,date_format(max(t.createTime),'%H:%i:%s') takeTime,t.nickName,p.id pcId,p.codeNo,p.createTime,p.state pcState,t.takeCount,t.takeScoreSum,t.jfye,s.score takeScore,s.openId from score_take_record t LEFT JOIN score_qrcode s on t.sqUuid=s.uuid LEFT JOIN prize_code p on s.uuid=p.sqUuid where s.enable=1 and t.gkjfqdShow=1
and (p.codeNo like CONCAT('%',#{searchTxt},'%') or t.nickName like CONCAT('%',#{searchTxt},'%'))
and s.accountNumber=#{accountNumber} GROUP BY date_format(t.createTime,'%m%d'),s.openid ORDER BY t.createTime desc
select * from public_goods where id=#{param1}
select * from account_info where id=#{param1}
select count(*) from public_goods where accountNumber=#{id}
select passWord from account_info where userName=#{userName}
select * from goods_label_set where module=#{module} and accountNumber=#{accountNumber} and isShow=1 order by sort
select count(*) from goods_label_set where accountNumber=#{param1}
select * from goods_label_set where accountNumber=#{param1} order by module limit ${param2},${param3}
select * from goods_label_set where id=#{param1}
mapper.update:
update goods_label_set set
label=#{label},
module=#{module},
isShow=#{isShow}, isPublic=#{isPublic}, isCheck=#{isCheck}, sort=#{sort} where id=#{id}
update account_info set openId=#{openId} where id=#{id}
update html_goods_text set accountNumber=#{accountNumber} where accountNumber=#{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from goods_label_set where `key`=#{key} and module=#{module} and accountNumber=#{accountNumber}
mapper.insert:
insert into score_take_record
uuid,
openId,
nickName,
takeCount,
takeScore,
jfye,
takeScoreSum,
createTime,
sqUuid,
accountNumber,
gkjfqdShow
values
#{uuid},
#{openId},
#{nickName},
#{takeCount},
#{takeScore},
#{jfye},
#{takeScoreSum},
now(),
#{sqUuid},
#{accountNumber},
1

select * from module_smyl where type=#{param1}

select * from module_dmtts where type=#{param1}

select * from html_goods_dmtts where goodsNumber=#{param1} and accountNumber=#{param2}

and accountNumber=#{accountNumber}
select * from score_qrcode where uuid=#{param1} and accountNumber=#{param2}
select * from html_goods_grmp where uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.delete: delete from goods_label_set where `key` in(#{keys}) and accountNumber=#{accountNumber}
